section.name: UNIT 3: ENERGY FLOW
section.summary:
Principle 2: Physical processes on Earth are the result of energy flow through the Earth system.

This principle explores the role of energy as the driver for all of Earth’s processes. Earth’s energy comes from a few sources:

    • The Sun
    • The Moon
    • The Earth

Principle 3: Biological processes depend on energy flow through the Earth system.

This principle explores the flow of energy, beginning with the Sun, through various processes on Earth. This principle is an ideal way to explore systems and ecosystems.
